# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [1.0.2] - 2024-10-18

### Updated

- Upgrade dependencies. 

## [1.0.1] - 2024-04-28

### Updated

- Development Logger only writes logs to files, when loggin_folder is set.

## [1.0.0] - 2024-02-29

### Added

- Initialize Logger.
